markup.content:
.container
	h1 Telos
	img(src="https://placeholder.scheibitz.com/600x400/000000/dddddd?text=600x400%20-%20%283:2%29")
.container.container--row
	.container__column
		h2 Management
		p
			a(href="#") mail@mail.com
	.container__column
		h2 Bookings
		p
			a(href="#") mail@mail.com
	.container__column
		h2 Press
		p
			a(href="#") mail@mail.com
.container
	.c-linklist
		a.c-linklist__link(href="#") Facebook
		a.c-linklist__link(href="#") Facebook
		a.c-linklist__link(href="#") Facebook
		a.c-linklist__link(href="#") Facebook

style.content:
body
	font-family: arial

.container
	margin: 2rem auto
	max-width: 900px
	text-align: center

	&--row
		display: flex
		justify-content: space-between

	&__column
		width: calc(33.333% - 1rem)

.c-linklist
	border-top: 2px solid #ccc
	margin: 5rem 0
	padding: 2rem 0

	&__link
		display: inline-block
		margin: 0 1rem
	
h1
	font-size: 3rem
	font-weight: bold
	margin: 1em 2em

h2
	text-transform: uppercase
	font-size: 1.5rem
	margin: 1em 2em

a
	color: currentColor
	text-decoration: none
		
	&:hover
		text-decoration: underline
